sQuestion: There are 37 short bushes and 30 tall trees currently in the park . Park workers will plant 20 short bushes today . How many short bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?

sentences.sentence: There are 37 short bushes and 30 tall trees currently in the park .
Park workers will plant 20 short bushes today .
How many short bushes will the park have when the workers are finished ?
